SEARCH
Package com.dreamwork.service

Class JobAdService

java.lang.Object
com.dreamwork.service.JobAdService
@Service public class JobAdService extends Object
Service class for managing job ad operations. This class provides methods for CRUD operations, filtering and managing candidate applications related to job ads.

  • Method Details

    • getAllJobAds

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<JobAdDTO> getAllJobAds(int page, int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of job ads.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number the retrieve
      size - the number of items per page
      Returns:
      a page of JobAdDTO with job ads

    • getFilteredJobAds

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<JobAdDTO> getFilteredJobAds(Seniority seniority, String city, String mainTechStack, LocalDate date, int page, int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of job ads filtered by the specified criteria.

      This method filters job ads based on seniority, city, main technology stack, and date. The results are returned as a `Page` of `JobAdDTO` objects.

      The method is annotated with `@Transactional(readOnly = true)`, indicating it performs read-only database operations.

      Parameters:
      seniority - the seniority level to filter by (e.g., JUNIOR, MID, SENIOR)
      city - the city to filter by; may be null if not filtering by city
      mainTechStack - the main technology stack to filter by; may be null if not filtering by technology
      date - the date to filter by; may be null if not filtering by date
      page - the page number (0-based) for pagination
      size - the size of the page (number of results per page)
      Returns:
      a Page of JobAdDTO objects that match the specified filters

    • createJobAd

      @Transactional public void createJobAd(JobAd jobAd)
      Creates a new job ad and associates it with the current recruiter.
      Parameters:
      jobAd - The JobAd entity to create

    • deleteJobAd

      @Transactional public void deleteJobAd(Long jobAdId)
      Deletes a job ad by ID, removes associations between job ad and candidates.
      Parameters:
      jobAdId - The ID of the job ad to delete
      Throws:
      JobAdNotFoundException - if the job ad does not exist

    • applyToJob

      @Transactional public void applyToJob(Long jobAdId, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile cvFile)
      This method allows to apply for a job ad with CV file.
      Parameters:
      jobAdId - ID of the JobAd to apply
      cvFile - the CV file of Candidate
      Throws:
      JobAdNotFoundException - if job ad is not found
      CvFileSaveException - if cv file is bigger than 10 mb or in another content type

    • getAllJobAdsForCandidate

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<JobAdDTO> getAllJobAdsForCandidate()
      Retrieves all job ads the current candidate has applied for.
      Returns:
      a list of JobAdDTO with the candidate's applied job ads

    • getAllJobAdsForRecruiter

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<JobAdDTO> getAllJobAdsForRecruiter()
      Retrieves all job ads created by the current recruiter.
      Returns:
      a list of JobAdDTO with the recruiter's job ads

    • getJobAdById

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public JobAdDTO getJobAdById(Long jobAdId)
      Retrieves a specific job ad by its ID.
      Parameters:
      jobAdId - the ID of the job ad
      Returns:
      a JobAdDTO with the job ad details
      Throws:
      JobAdNotFoundException - if the job ad is not found
